This package provides essential function to analyse the FARS (Fatality Analysis Reporting System) dataset

```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(Rhomework)
library(magrittr)
```

# Step one
Read the data using functions `fars_read` and `make_filename`.
Suppose we want to read 2015 data.


```{r, echo=FALSE}
setwd(system.file("data", package="Rhomework"))
fars_map_state(1, 2013)
```


The latter `fars_map_state` allows you to plot the incidents within a specified state on a map. 
E.g. the incidents map of the first state in the year 2015 can be writen as


```{r, echo=FALSE}
fars_map_state(state.num = 1, year = 2015)
```
